statements: SELECT * FROM voice_commands
SELECT command_name, command_action FROM voice_commands
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE id > 3
SELECT command_name FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_name DESC
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE id = 1;
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE command_action = 'run';
SELECT command_name, command_description FROM voice_commands WHERE command_description LIKE '%music%';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands;
SELECT command_name, action FROM voice_commands WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE voice_pattern = 'open sesame';
SELECT id, command_name FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_name ASC;
SELECT index_name, index_value FROM indexes WHERE command_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT command_name, action FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name = 'Open Door'
SELECT DISTINCT command_name, voice_pattern FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_name DESC
SELECT indexes.command_id, indexes.index_name, voice_commands.command_name FROM indexes INNER JOIN voice_commands ON indexes.command_id = voice_commands.id
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE '%Lights%'
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_id, user_id, executed_at FROM command_history WHERE history_id < 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM command_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_commands > 5;
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT command_name, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE 'S%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT u.user_name, v.command_name, c.executed_at FROM users u JOIN voice_commands v ON u.user_id = v.user_id JOIN command_history c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.executed_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT v.command_name, u.user_name, c.executed_at FROM command_history c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN voice_commands v ON c.command_id = v.id ORDER BY c.executed_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT u.user_name FROM users u JOIN command_history c ON u.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY u.user_name HAVING COUNT(c.history_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT command_name, command_text FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id='user123';
SELECT id, command_id, user_id, executed_at FROM command_history ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT command_id, index_name FROM command_index WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT command_name, command_text, created_at FROM voice_commands WHERE command_name LIKE '%search%';

SELECT voice_commands.command_name, command_history.executed_at FROM voice_commands JOIN command_history ON voice_commands.id = command_history.command_id WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT users.username, users.email, command_index.index_name FROM users JOIN command_index ON users.id = command_index.command_id;
SELECT command_text FROM voice_commands WHERE command_text ILIKE '%open%' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM device_info ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT command, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT command_id, index_value FROM command_index WHERE index_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM command_history ch JOIN user_profile up ON ch.user_id = up.user_id
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone'
SELECT command, timestamp FROM voice_commands WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM user_profile WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT c.command, ci.index_value FROM voice_commands c JOIN command_index ci ON c.id = ci.command_id
